description: Hatano (given name unknown) is http://anidb.net/ch5077 [Kenji]`s friend and classmate. He helps out at the gas station his family runs in the village. Hatano serves as the comic relief guy; he is not a good student (with one exception: sports) and has to take extra courses during summer holidays. He is known for having a crush on Kenji`s older cousin, http://anidb.net/ch5079 [Hikari], and tries to make a move on her but only ends up getting abused in various amusing ways.
name: Hatano
